title: The Choice
description: Caelynâ€™s sixteenth birthday is fast approaching, but unlike typical girls her age it is not an occasion she is looking forward to. While struggling to deal with the sudden and mysterious death of her sister a year earlier, she crosses paths with a mysterious, dark-haired boy who claims to know stuff about her sister. He brings her to another world, where she learns on her upcoming birthday, she will be faced with a choice. The choice to live, or die. Each choice will have a consequence that will separate her from the world she knows, threaten her very existence and the treasured memories of her sister. With only six days until her birthday, Caelyn has to face her enemies and race against the clock to figure out everything about her new life before it's time to make her choice. Will she choose to live? Or die?*This is book one of two*UPDATE: SEPTEMBER 1ST, 2015: Book Two, THE VESPER is now available!
author: Tiffany Roul
